_sText:
Dm_Matrix_Revolution

This is a death match map and has 40 spawns placed throughout the level.
Gravity is set to (0.5) of normal.

This is map 3 of 3 in the Matrix Trilogy. Each map has a different layout and texture set.

Get map 1 of 3, "dm_Matrix_Ultimate" Here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/108333
Get map 2 of 3, "dm_Matrix_Reload" Here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/108585

Blair (Bobpoblo) Burkhardt - Level Design
